member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Tizen.ColorExtensions.ToNative(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color)
member.summary: Creates an instance of ElmSharp.Color class based on provided Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Color instance

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Tizen.LayoutExtensions
member.summary: Extension class, provides native embedding functionalities.
member.remarks: This code is not used in the Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Tizen implementation, however it should not be removed as it allows developers to use native controls directly.

member.summary: Wraps the evas object into a view which can be used by Xamarin.
member.returns: The Xamarin view which wraps the evas object.
member.param: Optional delegate which provides measurements for the evas object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Forms.ConvertToPixel(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the dp into pixel considering current DPI value.
member.remarks: Use this API if you want to get pixel size without scaling factor.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Forms.ConvertToScaledPixel(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the dp into pixel by using scaling factor.
member.remarks: Use this API if you want to get pixel size from dp by using scaling factor. If the scaling factor is 1.0 by user setting, the same value is returned. This is mean that user doesn't want to pixel independent metric.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Forms.ConvertToScaledDP(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the pixel into dp value by using scaling factor.
member.remarks: If the scaling factor is 1.0 by user setting, the same value is returned. This is mean that user doesn't want to pixel independent metric.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Forms.ConvertToScaledDP(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the pixel into dp value by using scaling factor.
member.remarks: If the scaling factor is 1.0 by user setting, the same value is returned. This is mean that user doesn't want to pixel independent metric.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Forms.ConvertToEflFontPoint(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the sp into EFL's font size metric (EFL point).

member.summary: Convert the EFL's point into sp.
